attributes.action: Forest Fields atrocious pot holes and poor road conditions need repair
attributes.additional_details: please see the state of Falcon Road as only one example.
attributes.background: The pot holes in forest fields are a lethal, dangerous and threat to all locals. They are atrocious and the poor road conditions don’t help! We are at cost for council tax and damage they cause.

rejection.details:
Fixing potholes that are not on either motorways or A roads is the responsibility of your local authority, not of the UK Government or Parliament. If you'd like to report a pothole, you can do so using this link:

https://www.gov.uk/report-pothole
